name: Umbra Maze
description:
Umbra Maze is the setting of a game that combines 2D and 3D elements. The 2D world is located on the central wall, where the shadow moves according to the projected shadows, while in the 3D world, which is the girl's room, you will have to interact with objects to change the shadows that are projected on the 2D level. The objective of the game is for the shadow to absorb all the will-o'-the-wisps in each level to win.

This game takes place on a and aims to create a challenge for players. Move the elements you find in a girl's room to transform the space and advance together through the levels. Will you be able to complete the challenge?
